wordGroup: telephone handset 电话送受话器；听筒， 手机

sentences.en: At that point the radio handset fell to pieces.
sentences.cn: 就在那一刻收音机的遥控器摔碎了。

sentences.en: Most VCRs can be programmed using a remote control handset.
sentences.cn: 大多数录像机可用遥控器来设定程序。

sentences.en: It provides a raised area at the back of the phone which helps stop you scratching the handset when you put it down.
sentences.cn: 它在手机背面提供了一个抬高的区域，以助于防止你在放下它时把电话听筒划伤。
